In England, in the seven days to 06 August, there were 167,732 new confirmed cases (296.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 July, there were 162,508 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (5,224 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 August is 5,370,904 (9,497.6 cases per 100,000 population).
